info.abstract:
The Bar Chart component creates a bar chart of the input data. Use a tab-delimited file with column headers as input. The html output page contains options that you can use to adjust the bar chart to fit your need. The options are:
Variable: allows to select the column to be used in the bar chart.
Has Row Name: allows to specify if your data contains row names. If row names are not present, natural numbers are used for the x-axis labels.
Sort by: allows different ways to order the bars.
Download graph: allows to download graph as png file.
Show Advanced Options: allows finer tweak of the bar chart
info.inputs: tab-delimited - Must have column headers in the first row. Row names are optional.
info.outputs:
BarChart html file
Original Input Data File - unmodified
info.options: Options are in the output html. See the Abstract section above.
